text.section: In this section, "sexual abuse" has the meaning stated in § 5-701 of the Family Law Article.

An action for damages arising out of an alleged incident or incidents of sexual abuse that occurred while the victim was a minor shall be filed within 7 years of the date that the victim attains the age of majority.
